text: (He muham'mada!) Allahako krpale tapa'iko mana yiniharuprati narama cha ra yadi tapa'i katu vacana ra kathora hrdayako bha'eko bha'e yiniharu tapa'ibata tadha bhagihaldathe, tasartha tiniharula'i ksama garidinus ra tiniharuko nimti ksamako lagi prarthana garnus ra aphna kamaharuma yiniharusamga sarasallaha garne garnus, ra jaba kunai kamabare drdha niscaya gardachau bhane allahamathi purna bharosa rakha. Nihsandeha allaha bharosa garneharula'i prema gardacha
